contents.text: Welcome to Airtable in San Francisco, where part spreadsheet, part database, and entirely flexible solutions empower your team.
To ask questions about Airtable features and functionality, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist from our support team.

navigationGoals: Quickly learn how to set up Airtable automations
I need help setting up custom fields and filters in Airtable for my veteran outreach database.
I need guidance on configuring complex rollup fields and automating multi-table workflows in my Airtable base.
I need help learning how to sort my contact list alphabetically in my Airtable base.
I need help setting up custom formulas to calculate experimental uncertainties in my Airtable base.

contents.text: If you need to report an outage or a service incident, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our incident response team.

navigationGoals: Report a service outage affecting my Airtable base
I want to report that I can’t access my base right now and need to know when the service will be restored.
I’m encountering a service outage—my API calls are failing with 503 errors and bases aren’t syncing.
My Airtable workspace won’t load; I think there’s an outage, could you check?
I want to report that I can’t access my lab scheduling base due to a suspected service outage.

contents.text: For sales and account management, press 2.
For new subscriptions or pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details for upgrading my Airtable plan
I’m looking for subscription pricing options for our nonprofit veteran support group.
I want to upgrade to the Pro plan for higher API rate limits and advanced automation credits; please send pricing options.
I’d like pricing details for a new Airtable subscription with advanced features.
I’d like pricing details and student discount options for an academic team subscription.

contents.text: For billing inquiries or to manage your account, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with billing and account support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy and update my payment information
I need to update my billing info and review my last invoices for the Airtable account.
I need to update the credit card on file and get a breakdown of last month’s billing charges.
I want to update my payment method and check my latest billing statement.
I need to update my payment method and obtain my latest invoice for grant expense reporting.
